1111122.content:
Jessie hugged Christina.
"Thank you, all of you."

Things were soon ordered and ready.
Jessie laid down on the bed of her room, which would soon be a nursery. Who came in to diaper her and dress her in baby clothes?

choices: a baby dress that slightly shows off the diaper
11111221.content:
as Jessie was laying on her bed that would soon be replaced with a large crib along with the rest of the room soon becoming a nursery, Christina came into the room with a diaper in Jessie's size and some baby clothes that could also fit Jessie.

Jessie: "oh, hey Chris-"

Christina placed a finger on Jessie's lips shushing her.

Christina(smiling): "your part of the family and a baby now, you call me mommy from now on"


Christina then removed Jessie's clothes leaving the former nanny completely naked saying to Jessie she wouldn't be wearing her "grown-up clothes around the apartment for a long while.


Jessie then lifted her but up so her new mommy could put the diaper in place, she was then powdered with baby powder before the diaper was fastened into place, Jessie not once struggling during the process.

11111221.title: Christina.

111112211111.content: Who went over the rules, and what were they?
111112211111.title: went over rules with Jessie for going to camp

1111122111111.content:
Christina, being the mommy decided to be the one go over the rules.

Rule 1. the camp had been called so the staff knows of Jessie's position as the "youngest Ross", so Jessie will be a camper and treated as one of the younger campers.


Rule 2. Jessie being a baby can not be anywhere in or out of the camp without being supervised, has to go to her siblings or one of the other councilors if she needs her diaper changed.

Rule 3. also being a baby, since the Camp doesn't have bathtubs Jessie will have to share the shower with Emma or Zuri(another supervision thing)

Rule 4. Jessie has an earlier curfew than the rest of the campers.

were there any other rules?
1111122111111.title: Christina, option 1

15333333312.content:
In the home economics class, the teacher gave the students an assignment where the students would be split up to two sides, some would be babies while the rest are parents. Rosie was chosen to be a baby much to her embarrassment.

Her parent for the assignment turned out to be...

15333333321.title: Yeah

choices: No, later at Emma's house, Emma diapered Maybelle, or Zuri wanted to, or Jessie
153333333211.content:
Maybelle smiled as she made her way to Emma's table. Both went over the rules first.
1: This would last the 3 day weekend.
2: Emma would be mommy or mama.
3: Maybelle would have to act like a baby when at Emma's, using diapers and so on.
Were there any other rules?
153333333211.title: Emma

choices: Rosie put Maybelle into a diaper.
153333333212.content:
She was surprised that it was Emma's friend, Rosie.
Rosie liked the Texan after talking about her with Emma, and figured this assignment, as crazy as it sounded, could work. Did both go over the rules first?
153333333212.title: Rosie

1533333332121.content: The rules in question were?
1533333332121.title: Yeah

15333333321213.content:
1: Rosie would be either mommy, or mama.
2: When at Rosie's, Maybelle would act like a baby, including using diapers.
3: This would last over Spring Break.
Other rules?
15333333321213.title: Readers choice 3

info.brief_description: Treat the girls of Jessie and Bunk'd as babies.
info.description:
My Jessie Girls story, but now with the girls of Bunk'd as well.
Rules.
No killing. No drugs. No sex or gore. Anything gross stays in the diapers. Have fun.
